hooks.before:release: bun run build && bun run build:bin && zip -r api-comparator-v${version}.zip dist templates package.json DISTRIBUTION.md LICENSE
hooks.after:release: rm -f api-comparator-v*.zip && echo 'Bumping to next dev version' && npm version prerelease --preid=dev --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Bump to next dev version [skip ci]' && git push
